message:
Emergency A+(ve) Blood Required
If anyone is willing to donate blood for a cancer patient today, please contact me at my number.
Blood Group: A+
No of Bag: 2 (two)
Time: Today
Location: BSMMU (Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University), Shahbag, Dhaka.
Contact Person: Shyamal Biswas 
Mobile No: 01988833295
location: BSMMU (Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University), Shahbag, Dhaka.
